content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Pipe system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and furnaces have fuel to operate
- Ensure that boilers have fuel to operate

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network
- Ensure that pipe groups are connected to the fluid network

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to operate
- Ensure that furnaces have ingredients to operate

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
